channel.title: high energy physics on Ryan Moodie
channel.description: Recent content in high energy physics on Ryan Moodie

item.title: arXiv: optimising hadronic collider simulations using amplitude neural networks
item.description: The preprint for my ACAT 2021 proceedings contribution, Optimising hadronic collider simulations using amplitude neural networks, appeared on arXiv today (InspireHEP). This follows my recent talk. It is also available through the GitLab CI system here (source).

item.title: Phys. Let. B: NLO gluon fusion to diphoton plus jet cross sections
item.description: Following the arXiv release, the open access version of our paper Next-to-leading order QCD corrections to diphoton-plus-jet production through gluon fusion at the LHC was published online in Physics Letters B today.

item.title: ACAT 2021 talk: optimising simulations for diphoton production at hadron colliders using amplitude neural networks
item.description: I gave a virtual talk at ACAT 2021 (while I had COVID, actually) about our recent paper. Here are the slides (source) and a recording (below). Apologies for where the audio cuts out in the middle, but it’s really Zoom’s fault for not supporting Linux well.

item.title: JHEP: gluon fusion to diphoton plus jet amplitude at two loops
item.description: Following the arXiv release, our paper Virtual QCD corrections to gluon-initiated diphoton plus jet production at hadron colliders was published by the Journal of High Energy Physics today.

item.title: arXiv: NLO gluon fusion to diphoton plus jet cross sections
item.description: In our preprint appearing on arXiv today, Next-to-leading order QCD corrections to diphoton-plus-jet production through gluon fusion at the LHC, we use the two-loop amplitudes from Virtual QCD corrections to gluon-initiated diphoton plus jet production at hadron colliders along with the real corrections to obtain differential cross sections of gluon-initiated diphoton-plus-jet production at NLO (InspireHEP).

item.title: JHEP: gluon fusion to diphoton plus jets with amplitude neural networks
item.description: Following the preprint release, our paper Optimising simulations for diphoton production at hadron colliders using amplitude neural networks was published by the Journal of High Energy Physics today.

item.title: arXiv: gluon fusion to diphoton plus jets with amplitude neural networks
item.description: Our new paper Optimising simulations for diphoton production at hadron colliders using amplitude neural networks was listed on the arXiv today (InspireHEP). I posted about the code for this project yesterday.

item.title: arXiv: gluon fusion to diphoton plus jet amplitude at two loops
item.description: Today the preprint of our article Virtual QCD corrections to gluon-initiated diphoton plus jet production at hadron colliders appeared on arXiv (InspireHEP), in which we compute the two-loop gluon fusion to diphoton plus jet amplitude, providing it ready for phenomenological application in an accompanying NJet release.

item.title: YTF20: introduction to precision QCD
item.description: I was on the committee for the YTF 2019 and YTF 2020 conferences. For YTF20, I also gave a non-specialist talk on precision QCD. The talk is recorded (see below) and the slides are available here (source) (discussion of tech).
